snippet: Serena Williams said she was withdrawing from the season-ending W.T.A. Finals and the China Open to take time to heal after playing through injuries all year.
lead_paragraph: Serena Williams said she was withdrawing from the season-ending W.T.A. Finals and the China Open to take time to heal after playing through injuries all year.

headline.print_headline: Serena Williams Out for Two Tournaments to Heal Injuries
headline.main: Serena Williams Out for Two Tournaments to Heal Injuries
